name: Yumina the Ethereal

files.file1: N/A:Please select the JAST USA setup archive

files.file2: N/A:Please select the fist data archive

files.file3: N/A:Please select the second data archive

files.file4: N/A:Please select the third data archive

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the JAST USA setup archive
- file2: N/A:Please select the fist data archive
- file3: N/A:Please select the second data archive
- file4: N/A:Please select the third data archive
game:
  exe: drive_c/Games/Jast Densetsu/Yumina/Yumina.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- merge:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $file2
- merge:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $file3
- merge:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $file4
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
